short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was designed to keep you focused and engaged, no need to keep opening new tabs. Keep all your tools in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get all your tasks lined up in one spot where you can check them off, set deadlines, and watch your progress! Jot down any notes, whip up a new password, optimize CSS,  mix and match colors to create awesome color palettes, and save them for later. It's your go-to spot for keeping everything organized and colorful, making your day-to-day just a bit easier and more manageable.
